alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Hill; Johnson; Kaufman; Rockwall; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockwall, southwestern Hunt, northwestern Kaufman, central Johnson, southeastern Tarrant, northwestern Hill, northwestern Ellis and Dallas Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Garland to Lake Pat Cleburne. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Arlington, Garland, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Mansfield, Rowlett, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Rockwall, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Cleburne, Balch Springs, University Park, Sachse, Midlothian, Seagoville and Forney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Dallas; Ellis; Hill; Johnson; Kaufman; Rockwall; Tarrant
